ya3.2.3:289.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:289.1_2: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:290.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya3.2.3:291.1_0: Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:292.1_0: Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṁ aghānakānaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ upapajjantānaṁ rūpāvacarānaṁ arūpāvacarānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjati,
ya3.2.3:292.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:292.1_2: Parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:293.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya3.2.3:294.1_0: Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:295.1_0: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ aghānakānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanaṁ nuppajjati,
ya3.2.3:295.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:295.1_2: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.

ya3.2.3:297.1_0: Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?

ya3.2.3:298.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:298.1_2: Parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:299.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjatīti?
ya3.2.3:300.1_0: Asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati,
ya3.2.3:300.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjati.
ya3.2.3:300.1_2: Parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati.

ya3.2.3:302.1_0: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ arūpakānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjati,
ya3.2.3:302.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:302.1_2: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.

ya3.2.3:304.1_0: Yassa yattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:305.1_0: Sabbesaṁ cavantānaṁ acittakānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjati,
ya3.2.3:305.1_1: no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:305.1_2: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.

ya3.2.3:307.1_0: Yassa cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjittha tassa sotāyatanaṁ nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:308.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca arūpaṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cavantānaṁ tesaṁ cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjittha,
ya3.2.3:308.1_2: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhāyatanañca uppajjittha sotāyatanañca nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:309.1_0: Yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṁ nirujjhissati tassa cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
